contents-list.explanation: A large boat used for traveling long distances over the sea
samples: The man in the blue shirt is the captain of the ship.

contents-list.explanation: a part of the ocean, a lake, etc., that is next to land and that is used to provide safety for ships
samples: They sailed into Portsmouth Harbor.

contents-list.explanation: at or before the correct moment
samples: Please hand in your homework on time.

contents-list.explanation: a written or spoken request for someone to go somewhere or to do something
samples: We sent out more than 100 invitations for the party.

contents-list.explanation: something or someone that causes a feeling of happiness, enjoyment, or satisfaction
samples: It would be my pleasure to help.

contents-list.explanation: extremely good, great, or large
samples: The new job is an incredible opportunity.

contents-list.explanation: a large wooden or plastic box used for moving things from one place to another
samples: The bear arrived at the zoo in a crate.

contents-list.explanation: not liking to work hard or to be active
samples: I should have done more work this weekend, but I was feeling lazy.

contents-list.explanation: an opening into or through something
samples: I have a hole in my sock.

contents-list.explanation: not having or showing concern or respect for the rights and feelings of other people
samples: I can't believe that he was so rude to me.

contents-list.explanation: a light and friendly conversation
samples: We enjoyed a chat over coffee.

contents-list.explanation: a boy or man who has one or both of the same parents as you
samples: Her big brother is a doctor.

contents-list.explanation: the man someone is married to
samples: They were husband and wife for almost 60 years.

contents-list.explanation: a parent of your father or mother
samples: My grandparents live in Sussex.

contents-list.explanation: a child of your son or daughter
samples: I am the fifth grandchild of my grandparents.

contents-list.explanation: a person who never had a brother or sister
samples: I was an only child.

contents-list.explanation: a daughter of your brother or sister
samples: If he's my uncle, then I'm his niece.

contents-list.explanation: a son of your brother or sister
samples: I am planning a 25th birthday party for my nephew.

contents-list.explanation: to show that you are happy or that you think something is funny by smiling and making a sound from your throat
samples: What are you laughing about?

contents-list.explanation: to take pleasure in something
samples: He always enjoys a good laugh.
